Post-Match Reflections: Nicholas Kirton was awarded Player of the Match
Canada won 2 points and Ireland 0 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
Ireland elected to field first and won the toss
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
The umpires for the match were Richard Kettleborough, Sam Nogajski, Chris Brown, and Chris Gaffaney
